I recently bought this blush in Inhibition. It is more tan and peachy than it appears in the picture here, but I knew that based on online reviews. That one seems to be red based and will go with my pinker makeup looks.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_title: Great overall but lacks staying power
review_content: I love this color on my skin. Seriously have been using this blush for 2 years and I haven’t even hit the pan. There’s so much in there. The color is bright and has a lot of pigment so a little goes a long way. It looks great on my medium tan skin. Expensive but the quantity justifies it. I’m knocking off a star because it lacks longevity. Stays on for 3-4 hours and then I don’t see anything after.

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Love Tom Ford but not this blush. All shimmer and a very unnatural orangey color. it only ended up highlighting my pores and they are tiny and normally not noticeable. Doesn't even work as a highlight because of unnatural orange color. would not recommend, ended up throwing out.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Tom Ford blushes are out of this world!
review_content:
I use a number of high-end/luxury blushes. But, the Tom Ford blush FAR EXCEEDS all blushes in the market. The pigmentation is out of this world. A little goes a very long way. No doubt this blush is expensive, but it will last you a long time depending on the shade that you buy. If you buy Ravish or Love Lust, then you only need a little amount because it's so pigmented! Inhibition is also a gorgeous blush to use in the summertime with orange/coral lips and a bronze/gold eye look. FYI I'm East Indian with NC35 skin tone during the winter and NC40 in the summer.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_title: U NEED. I bought Inhibition, can’t click right one
review_content:
First off I am in between the light and medium skin tone, especially in winter. Then I transition to medium in the spring and summer. I have dry skin and suffer from redness on my cheeks. I don’t like to do a full coverage of foundation on my face to cover it up- just a personal- trying to embrace my flaws- preference. So with that, all the pretty pink blushes out there are a no go for me sadly. What was a GO for me was the shade Inhibition!! It’s registering very pink on the site but I would suggest you google image any of these blushes. Inhibition is this perfect brown-peach-but not harsh-natural PERFECTION. It doesn’t hurt to add that you literally have to take a baby swipe with a brush and it is full of product with glorious pigmentation. Seriously so impressed and will never look at another blush the same way. Purchase was 210% worth it to me. I will be buying Love Lust once the warmer weather rolls around for where I live.
…read more

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
Flush and Wicked are both gorgeous. Such a happy blush! Gives the skin a beautiful rosy color (not shimmery and not flat). High quality and very pigmented. You need a little touch. So smooth and buttery. You can build up if you want. On light or light-to-medium skintone, the Flush is a pretty bright pink shade. Wicked is a warmer muted pink shade. Two are different. I also like Paradise Lust duo (that blush is more Coral). Love Tom Ford beauty products.

i really regret buying this blush! color is meh & the pigmentation is also meh. not long-wearing & SMELLS WEIRD (maybe i got a dud idk) but beware!!

This is my holy grail of blushes. It is a bit pricey but worth every penny. I own 3 colors and they all live up to the hype. They blend like a dream and stay on all day. I always receive so many compliments when I wear these blushes. I've used them over many months and haven't even made a dent in the product. Love love love!

I'm very impressed with this formula; it "becomes one" with the skin. Flush looks great on black women. One star taken off solely for the price.
